data.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
data.summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

data.title: Inception (2010)
data.summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

data.title: Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
data.summary: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

data.title: Interstellar (2014)
data.summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

data.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
data.summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

data.title: Back to the Future (1985)
data.summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

data.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
data.summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

data.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
data.summary: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them obtaining its powers.

data.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout (2018)
data.summary: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2 (2011)
data.summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

data.title: Guardians of the Galaxy (2014)
data.summary: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

data.title: The Avengers (2012)
data.summary: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

data.title: Jurassic Park (1993)
data.summary: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

data.title: Mad Max: Fury Road (2015)
data.summary: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

data.title: Deadpool (2016)
data.summary: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and a quest for revenge.

data.title: The Martian (2015)
data.summary: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

data.title: Deadpool 2 (2018)
data.summary: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

data.title: Thor: Ragnarok (2017)
data.summary: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004)
data.summary: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new "Defense Against the Dark Arts" teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.

data.title: The Goonies (1985)
data.summary: In order to save their home from foreclosure, a group of misfits set out to find a pirate's ancient valuable treasure.

data.title: Captain America: Civil War (2016)
data.summary: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

data.title: Deliverance (1972)
data.summary: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

data.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 (2017)
data.summary: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (2005)
data.summary: A young wizard finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1 (2010)
data.summary: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

data.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service (2014)
data.summary: A spy organization recruits an unrefined, but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program, just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

data.title: Ready Player One (2018)
data.summary: When the creator of a virtual reality world called the OASIS dies, he releases a video in which he challenges all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (2001)
data.summary: An orphaned boy enrolled in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

data.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
data.summary: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

data.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
data.summary: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

data.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
data.summary: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

data.title: Wonder Woman (2017)
data.summary: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

data.title: Doctor Strange (2016)
data.summary: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007)
data.summary: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

data.title: The Predator (2018)
data.summary: When a young boy accidentally triggers the universe's most lethal hunters' return to Earth, only a ragtag crew of ex-soldiers and a disgruntled science teacher can prevent the end of the human race.

data.title: Black Panther (2018)
data.summary: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

data.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp (2018)
data.summary: As Scott Lang balances being both a Super Hero and a father, Hope van Dyne and Dr. Hank Pym present an urgent new mission that finds the Ant-Man fighting alongside The Wasp to uncover secrets from their past.

data.title: The Shape of Water (2017)
data.summary: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

data.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron (2015)
data.summary: When Tony Stark and Bruce Banner try to jump-start a dormant peacekeeping program called Ultron, things go horribly wrong and it's up to Earth's mightiest heroes to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plan.

data.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016)
data.summary: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

data.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation (2015)
data.summary: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

data.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (2002)
data.summary: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.

data.title: Ant-Man (2015)
data.summary: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

data.title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi (2017)
data.summary: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

data.title: Hostiles (2017)
data.summary: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

data.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story (2018)
data.summary: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

data.title: Alpha (2018)
data.summary: In the prehistoric past, a young man struggles to return home after being separated from his tribe during a buffalo hunt. He finds a similarly lost wolf companion, and starts a friendship that would change humanity.

data.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017)
data.summary: Four teenagers are sucked into a magical video game, and the only way they can escape is to work together to finish the game.

data.title: X-Men: Apocalypse (2016)
data.summary: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant, the world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan.

data.title: The Mummy (1999)
data.summary: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a mummy that wreaks havoc on him, and his crew.

data.title: Jurassic World (2015)
data.summary: A new theme park, built on the original site of Jurassic Park, creates a genetically modified hybrid dinosaur, which escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

data.title: Oblivion (I) (2013)
data.summary: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

data.title: Annihilation (2018)
data.summary: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

data.title: Captain America: The First Avenger (2011)
data.summary: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

data.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle (2017)
data.summary: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the United States. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.

data.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy (2005)
data.summary: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy."

data.title: The Sisters Brothers (2018)
data.summary: In 1850s Oregon, a gold prospector is chased by the infamous duo of assassins, the Sisters brothers.

data.title: Adrift (I) (2018)
data.summary: A true story of survival, as a young couple's chance encounter leads them first to love, and then on the adventure of a lifetime as they face one of the most catastrophic hurricanes in recorded history.

data.title: Justice League (2017)
data.summary: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

data.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales (2017)
data.summary: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the trident of Poseidon while being pursued by an undead sea captain and his crew.

data.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016)
data.summary: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

data.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom (2018)
data.summary: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

data.title: The Spy Who Dumped Me (2018)
data.summary: Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.

data.title: Tomb Raider (2018)
data.summary: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father disappeared.

data.title: Rampage (2018)
data.summary: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

data.title: Spider-Man 3 (2007)
data.summary: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

data.title: Mile 22 (2018)
data.summary: An elite American intelligence officer, aided by a top-secret tactical command unit, tries to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of the country.

data.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back (2016)
data.summary: Jack Reacher must uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy in order to clear his name. On the run as a fugitive from the law, Reacher uncovers a potential secret from his past that could change his life forever.

data.title: Suicide Squad (2016)
data.summary: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

data.title: Cold Skin (2017)
data.summary: In 1914, a young man arrives at a remote island near the Antarctic Circle to take the post of weather observer only to find himself trapped in a watchtower besieged by deadly creatures which live in hiding on the island.

data.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising (2018)
data.summary: Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

data.title: The Mummy (2017)
data.summary: An ancient Egyptian princess is awakened from her crypt beneath the desert, bringing with her malevolence grown over millennia, and terrors that defy human comprehension.

data.title: Transformers: The Last Knight (2017)
data.summary: Autobots and Decepticons are at war, with humans on the sidelines. Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving our future lies buried in the secrets of the past, in the hidden history of Transformers on Earth.

data.title: A-X-L (2018)
data.summary: A.X.L. is a top-secret, robotic dog who develops a special friendship with Miles and will go to any length to protect his new companion.

data.title: How It Ends (2018)
data.summary: A desperate man tries to return home to his pregnant fiancée after a mysterious apocalyptic event turns everything to chaos.

data.title: The Little Mermaid (2018)
data.summary: A young reporter and his niece discover a beautiful and enchanting creature they believe to be the real little mermaid.

data.title: Captain Marvel (2019)
data.summary: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

data.title: Untitled Avengers Movie (2019)
data.summary: The plot is yet to be revealed. Will be the fourth installment of the 'Avengers' series.

data.title: Aquaman (2018)
data.summary: Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, and must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.

data.title: X-Men: Dark Phoenix (2019)
data.summary: Jean Grey begins to develop incredible powers that corrupt and turn her into a Dark Phoenix. Now the X-Men will have to decide if the life of a team member is worth more than all the people living in the world.

data.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald (2018)
data.summary: The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series set in J.K. Rowling's Wizarding World featuring the adventures of magizoologist Newt Scamander.

data.title: The Nutcracker and the Four Realms (2018)
data.summary: A young girl is transported into a magical world of gingerbread soldiers and an army of mice.

data.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)
data.summary: Plot unknown.

data.title: Untitled Terminator Reboot (2019)
data.summary: Plot unknown.

data.title: Robin Hood (I) (2018)
data.summary: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown in a thrilling action-adventure packed with gritty battlefield exploits, mind-blowing fight choreography, and a timeless romance.

data.title: Johnny English Strikes Again (2018)
data.summary: After a cyber-attack reveals the identity of all of the active undercover agents in Britain, Johnny English is forced to come out of retirement to find the mastermind hacker.

data.title: Wonder Woman 1984 (2019)
data.summary: Plot unknown. A sequel to the 2017 super hero film 'Wonder Woman'.
